bug.author: jaechanglim
bug.description: I think that the indentation of line 104 in deepchem/contrib/mpnn/mpnn.py is wrong.. it's indentation level should be one below isn't it?

comments.comment: <denchmark-link:https://github.com/jaechanglim>@jaechanglim</denchmark-link> I think you are correct. The code in contrib is held to a lower standard than the code in the rest of the repo. A PR to fix this issue would be much appreciated!
Is this issue supposed to be open still? The bug appears to have been fixed.
